title: Week 9 Picks, Dan Fouts Interview (Football 11/03)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora link up for their weekly picks against the spread, starting with analysis of the Eagles hosting new starter, Brock Osweiler, and the Broncos, two teams coming off the bye as the Rams visit the Giants, and an NFC South battle of teams trending in opposite directions, as the Bucs take on the Saints. The bets continue on Bengals-Jags, Falcons-Panthers, Colts-Texans, Chiefs-Cowboys, Lions-Packers and more. Then, Will and Pete are joined by NFL Hall of Famer Dan Fouts to discuss quarterback play across the league, how the position has changed over the years, and the Air Coryell offense.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
